entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this morning. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle and flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
